The @EnvAgency calculate that Affinity Water are over abstracting local chalk streams to the tune of about 430 million litres of water per day.

That's almost 10% of the world's total supply of chalk streams degraded for profit.

Let's talk about a clean conscience shall we. https://t.co/J8nQmVNWlv

Judging by social media it’s another appalling evening of odour - reports from Knutton, Milehouse, Wolstanton, Basford, Porthill. 😢🤢

Please keep reporting to the @EnvAgency on 0800 80 70 60 #StopTheStink

Where exactly are all these national resources that we’ve been told have been drafted in? The situation at Walley’s Quarry is escalating at a severe pace. Multiple agencies, no action!WAKE UP! @DefraGovUK @BorisJohnson @EnvAgency @MattHancock @PHE_uk @AaronBell4NUL #stopthestink https://t.co/KWpdutYaGW

Really fear where this is going to end @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @PHE_EoEngland @StaffordshireCC #stopthestink https://t.co/ge3XKekEMs

Will definitely be giving to the legal fund&need to think of ways to fund raise&ask some big money sponsors for help to fight @RedIndustries2 .A whole community suffering will take on Red @HSBC_UK @BGFinvestments -so you know what you’re in for as their investors @StinkStopthe https://t.co/KHbJhHstUd

@SuzVW @Tus_M_ @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA My emails have been bouncing back lately so I rang up this morning. I was given another email address; however, the email address has not been changed on their website...

So @EventbriteUK you're planning Funtopia in Newcastle under Lyme 19th May.
